column5: http://www.lebaron.c...o_sale_2010.pdf  Apr15-18 2010 Also saw $2 trilene Xl spinning reel spool up max 2 reels.  edit found promos http://www.lebaron.ca/english/free_offers_2010.pdf
are they doing this a lot more often or is it just me ?
thanks for posting that. I was hoping to come down for the next sale for a new musky reel but don't see it happening this week-end. Oh well, always next time
should this include Mtl store?
Montreal fleyer says yes http://www.lebaron.ca/english/mtl_sale_2010.pdf  also go habs go.
sweet, buy 2 packs of fishing line get a free nail clipper

yeah lol. If they had the power pro for $13 no tax like the other fishing store, I'd be there for sure. Nail clipper/free hat no so much. Berkley giving away free bag with gulp purchase: probably to reduce leakage on the carpet  and consequential wife beating up husband.
Power Pro is on special already, I believe.
hmm don't see it http://lebaron.ca/english/specials.htm  I'll call tomorrow when they open.
I was in on Monday and they had it on sale...13.99 maybe.
Thanks for the heads up. I'll call anyhow, better to check in stock before going.
I was THISSSSSSSSSSSS close to buying a Minn kota terrova 55lb US2/AP.. $1267 + NO TAX + $100 rebate(ended today) = $1167...

must be our loonie setting at par with the US dollar, I was seriously considering visit my buddy in Buffalo and picking up some fishing gears, but now I feel like there is just one more reason for me to support Canadian companies now.
Thanks for the heads up.

ADB: I just called them at the Mississauga location. Power Pro 30lb braid 150 yds $14.45. Nice. Still tempted to buy the Suffix braid lol. I will sample them in store being such a connoisseur of fishing line .
Not bad compared to Bass Pro's regular price of $21+

This was posted by a guy I know that works at LeBarons in Ottawa.........  its a 50yr anniversary  no tax on everything regular priced items, that are in stock. no rain checks or layaways (doesnt include ammo)  other cool things  purchase a fenwick rod = free hat purchase and Abu rod = free hat purchase a gloomis rod = free shirt purchase 3 rapalas = free rapala sports towel purchase 2 spools or berkley, stren or spiderwire line = free berkley clippers purchase 3 gulp buckets or gulp alive = free gulp alive cooler bag purchase any minnkota motor = free minnkota lock purchase a quantum PT rod = free hat purchase a rapala rod = free rapala Rtype hat Trigger X sale bin = all at $2.94 a pack  all promotions are while stock lasts! the berkley clippers are getting low!
the worst costomer service ever !!!!!
The topic is about saving money by LeBarons having a TAX-FREE sale and not about customer service....
bills bait was selling power pro at the line sale, which is still today I believe, 6cents a yard, thats 150 yards for $9bucks, I even got a spare spool of 300 yards....for 18 bucks
This one in Hamilton? http://www.billsbaitandtackle.ca/ Good to know thanks.
